item.title: A responsive webapp
item.description: Snippet Run it Manifest Using responsive meta tags for an apps script webapp To display a responsive webapp on different devices you can use the addMetaTag method Snippet See full code Leave a comment Create script from the snippet  *See how to use scrviz for clone Apps Script project index.js /* exported doGet */ /** * Using responsive meta tags for the webapp */ function doGet() { const htmlContent = 'Hello world!
